description:
Local development environment for the 360 Feedback Platform API.

All auto-populated variables (cycleId, assignmentId, reviewerId, accessToken) are written by test scripts inside the collection — you do not need to fill them in manually.

Update adminEmail / adminPassword if you used different credentials during seed-admin.
